issue.title: [C++] Improve CSV parser performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The CSV parser is currently the bottleneck when reading CSV files. There are a couple ways to make it a bit faster.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3666?focusedCommentId=16675396) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2886
